title: Changes to Cabinet and other appointments
description: Promotion to Senior Minister of StatMr Teo Chee Hean – Strategy Group, Smart Nation and Digital Government Group, Public Service Division, National Security Coordination Secretariat, National Population and Talent Division and National Climate Change Secretariat. Also assists PM in National Research Foundation mattersMr Tharman Shanmugaratnam – Monetary Authority of Singapore. Also assists PM in Productivity Fund Administration Board mattersDr Yaacob Ibrahim – Muslim affairs and Cyber SecurityDr Vivian Balakrishnan – Smart NationMr Gan Kim Yong – Aging issuesMr Heng Swee Keat – Council for Skills, Innovation and Productivity, National Research Foundation matters (assisting Mr Teo Chee Hean)Ms Grace Fu Hai Yien – Municipal Services OfficeMr Chan Chun Sing – People’s AssociationMr Tan Chuan-Jin – CDC matters (assisting Mr Chan Chun Sing)Mr Masagos Zulkifli – Muslim affairs (assisting Dr Yaacob Ibrahim)Mr Ong Ye Kung – Public Sector Innovation (assisting Mr Teo Chee Hean)Mrs Josephine Teo – Population matters (assisting Mr Teo Chee Hean)Dr Janil Puthucheary – GovtechMr Sam Tan – REACH+Explicit responsibilities assigned within Ministry of Trade and IndustryMr Lim Hng Kiang – Economic Development Board, Jurong Town Corporation, Department of Statistics, Competition Commission of SingaporeMr S Iswaran – Agency for Science Technology and Research, Energy Market Authority, Hotel Licensing Board, Singapore Tourism Board, Sentosa Development Corporation, International Enterprise Singapore, SPRING Singapore%Explicit responsibilities assigned within Ministry of EducationMr Ng Chee Meng – Pre-school Education, Special Education, General Education (Primary, Secondary, Junior Colleges/Centralised Institutes)Mr Ong Ye Kung – Institute of Technical Education, Polytechnics, Universities, Private Education Institutions, Continuing Education and Training, Skills Upgrading and Workforce Training
